title: 06/04/21 DPS Hour 2 Mike Krzyzewski and Dan Le Batard
itunes:title: 06/04/21 DPS Hour 2 Mike Krzyzewski and Dan Le Batard
description:
Mike Krzyzewski talks to Dan about how it was time for him to retire. Coach K says that he likes the fact that he gets to pick his retirement rather than being forced out. Dan Le Batard mentions how appreciative he is of Dan Patrick's broadcasting career and how much he loves Dan Patrick. Le Batard tells Dan that he is the Dan Of All Dan's.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
